overview_summary: None of these neighboring landowners have an openly documented stance regarding development or clean energy projects, so their positions remain unclear. Similarly, none hold prominent public roles; all appear to have limited community influence in terms of formal authority or leadership.

neighbors.name: Shirley Delta Maye
neighbors.claims: Shirley Delta Maye owns land in the Falling Waters district of northern Berkeley County, WV ([contempo3.blogspot.com](https://contempo3.blogspot.com/2018/03/falling-waters-west-virginia-falling.html#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%2C%20West%20Virginia,has%20a%20population%20of%20876)). No public statements by Maye on local development or energy projects were found in news archives or county records as of this profile ([contempo3.blogspot.com](https://contempo3.blogspot.com/2018/03/falling-waters-west-virginia-falling.html#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%2C%20West%20Virginia,has%20a%20population%20of%20876)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowner; not a public figure

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach personally through a trusted local intermediary to build rapport and learn her concerns, since her views and priorities have not been publicly voiced.

neighbors.name: Scott and Linda Funkhouser
neighbors.claims: Scott and Linda Funkhouser jointly own a residential property at 445 Falcon Drive in Falling Waters, Berkeley County ([www.locatefamily.com](https://www.locatefamily.com/F/FUN/FUNKHOUSER-147.html#:~:text=445%20Falcon%20Drive)). There is no record of the Funkhousers taking a public stance on local development or clean energy issues in the community ([www.locatefamily.com](https://www.locatefamily.com/F/FUN/FUNKHOUSER-147.html#:~:text=445%20Falcon%20Drive)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Funkhousers via a respectful, in-person conversation (for example, through a neighbor or local farm community contact) to understand any concerns they might have about nearby projects.

neighbors.name: Ronald W. Hardy
neighbors.claims: Ronald W. Hardy is listed as a landowner in the Potomac/Falling Waters area of Berkeley County ([contempo3.blogspot.com](https://contempo3.blogspot.com/2018/03/falling-waters-west-virginia-falling.html#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%2C%20West%20Virginia,has%20a%20population%20of%20876)). No evidence could be found of Hardy participating in public discussions or filings related to development proposals or energy projects ([contempo3.blogspot.com](https://contempo3.blogspot.com/2018/03/falling-waters-west-virginia-falling.html#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%2C%20West%20Virginia,has%20a%20population%20of%20876)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a local community liaison reach out one-on-one to Mr. Hardy to build trust and invite him to share any views or questions, given that he has not publicly engaged on development issues.

neighbors.name: Dennis F. Murphy
neighbors.claims: Dennis F. Murphy owns property in the Falling Waters area of Berkeley County, West Virginia ([contempo3.blogspot.com](https://contempo3.blogspot.com/2018/03/falling-waters-west-virginia-falling.html#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%2C%20West%20Virginia,has%20a%20population%20of%20876)). Murphy has no recorded public comments or notable civic roles related to local development or energy initiatives in Berkeley County ([contempo3.blogspot.com](https://contempo3.blogspot.com/2018/03/falling-waters-west-virginia-falling.html#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%2C%20West%20Virginia,has%20a%20population%20of%20876)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Project representatives should approach Murphy in an open-ended, neighborly manner to introduce the project and listen to any concerns, since he has not previously voiced opinions on community development.

neighbors.name: Trayer T. Rudy
neighbors.claims: Trayer T. Rudy serves as the Facilities Manager at Berkeley Medical Center (City Hospital) in Martinsburg ([wvlegals.com](https://wvlegals.com/public-notice-7125/#:~:text=Dated%20this%20the%204th%20day,of%20December%2C%202020)). He also owns property in the Falling Waters district of Berkeley County, but no public positions by Rudy on development or energy matters have been documented ([wvlegals.com](https://wvlegals.com/public-notice-7125/#:~:text=Dated%20this%20the%204th%20day,of%20December%2C%202020)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Professional community member; no civic role

approach_recommendations.engage: Considering his professional background, a factual and pragmatic outreach (possibly via a business or community leader he respects) is recommended to discuss project details and address any infrastructure or community impact questions he may have.
